lead_paragraph: The New England Patriots and quarterback Tom Brady reportedly agreed to a two-year contract extension through the 2019 season when he will be 42.

headline.print_headline: Brady, Patriots Agree on Two-Year Extension, Report
headline.main: Brady, Patriots Agree on Two-Year Extension, Report

snippet: The New England Patriots and quarterback Tom Brady reportedly agreed to a two-year contract extension through the 2019 season when he will be 42....
